Title: Things Are Going to Get Worse
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Heather Zuhlke, Safia Dirie (executive story editor), Jeff Dix (story editor), Monica Mitchell (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Proctor works to protect his client as Ghost faces harassment; the team discusses its strategy for taking down St. Patrick; Tommy struggles to let go of his old duties; Tasha talks to the children about what is going on.
